Translations.Text: Atyacarinna ani tyancya sathidaranna ani jyanci jyanci te (allahakherija) upasana karita hote
(Tya sarvanna) ekatra karuna, tyanna jahannamaca marga dakhava
Ani tyanna thambavuna ghya (yasathi) ki tyanna avasyaka prasna vicarale janara aheta
(Ya veli) tumhi ekamekanci madata karita nahita, yala karana kaya
Kimbahuna te (sarvajana) aja ajnadharaka banale aheta
Ani te ekamekanna sambodhuna prasnottara karu lagatila
Mhanatila ki tumhi tara amacyajavala amacya ujavya bajune yeta asata
Te uttara detila ki navhe, ulata tumhica imana rakhanare navhate
Ani amacya tumacyavara kahica jora navhata, kimbahuna tumhi tara (svatah) vidrohi loka hote
Ata amha (sarvam) vara amacya palanakartyace he pharmana lagu jhaleca ahe ki amhi (siksa-yatanaci) godi cakhanara ahota
Tevha amhi tumhala pathabhrasta kele, amhi tara svatahdekhila pathabhrastateta hoto
Tevha ajacya divasi (sarvaca) siksa yatanece vatekari aheta
Amhi aparadhi lokansi asaca (vyavahara) karato
He ase (loka) aheta ki jevha tyanna sangitale jate ki allahakherija konihi upasya nahi, tevha he ghamenda karita asata
Ani mhanata ki kaya amhi apalya daivatanna eka vedya kavicya bolanyavaruna soduna dyave
(Nahi mulica nahi) kimbahuna paigambara tara satya (sacca dina dharma) ghe'una ale aheta ani sarva paigambaranna khare janatata
Nihsansaya, tumhi duhkhadayaka siksa-yatanam (ci godi) cakhanara ahata
Ani tumhala tyacaca mobadala dila ja'ila, je tumhi karita hote
Tathapi allahace sacce, pramanika dasa
Tyancyacakarita nirdharita ajivika (roji) ahe
(Pratyeka prakarace) meve ani te sanmanita adaraniya asatila
Sukhanni bharalelya jannatimadhye
Asananvara ekamekancya samora basale asatila
Pravahita (vahatya) madyace pyale tyancya daramyana phirata asatila
Je svaccha sapheda ani pyayala svadista asela
Na tyadvare dokedukhi ho'ila ani na te pyayalyane bahakatila
Ani tyancyajavala najara khali thevanarya ani mothamothe sundara netra asanarya (hura-parya) asatila
Asa ki janu lapavuna thevaleli andi
(Jannatace loka) ekamekankade tonda karuna vicaratila
Tyancyapaiki eka sanganara sangela ki majha eka javalaca (sobati) hota
Jo (mala) sangata ase ki kaya tu (kayamatacya yenyaca) visvasa rakhanaryampaiki ahesa
Kaya jevha amhi melyavara mati ani hade ho'una ja'u, kaya tya veli amhala (krta karmanca) mobadala dila ja'ila
Sangitale ja'ila, tumhi icchita ki dokavuna pahave
Dokavuna pahataca tyala jahannamamadhye madhyabhagi (jalatana) disela
To mhanela, allahaci sapatha! Tu tara majhahi sarvanasa karanyacya javala hota
Jara majhyavara majhya palanakartyaci krpa nasati tara mi dekhila jahannamamadhye hajara kelya janaryampaiki asato
Kaya (he ucita ahe ki) amhi marana pavanaraca nahita
Pahilya eka mrtyukherija, ani na amhala azaba (siksa - yatana) dila ja'ila
Maga tara (spasta ahe ki) hi phara mothi saphalata ahe
Asi (saphalata) prapta karanyasathi acarana karanaryanni acarana kele pahije
Kaya he atithya adhika cangale ahe ki jakkumace jhada
Jyala amhi atyacari lokankarita kathina kasoti banavile ahe
Nihsansaya, te jhada jahannamacya talapasuna nighate
Jyace ghonsa (gucche) saitanacya dokyansarakhe asatata
Jahannamavasi yaca jhadala khatila ani yacyacadvare pota bharatila
Maga tyavara ukalate pani pyave lagale
Maga tya sarvance paratane jahannamacya (agi) kadeca asela
Visvasa kara ki tyanna apale vadavadila pathabhrasta (asalyace) adhalale
Ani he tyancyaca padacinhanvara dhavata jata rahile
Ani tyancyapurvi ho'una gelele aneka loka margabhrasta jhale aheta
Ani jyancyata amhi khabaradara karanare rasula (paigambara) pathavile hote
Ata tumhi paha ki jyanna (allahacya azabace) bhaya dakhavile gele hote, tyanca sevata kasa jhala
Allahacya sacca pramanika dasankherija
Amhala nuhane pukarale tara paha ki amhi kiti cangale du'a (prarthana) kabula karanare ahota
Ani amhi tyanna ani tyancya kutumbiyanna tya ghora sankatapasuna vacavile
Ani tyacya santatila amhi baki rahanari banavile
Ani amhi tyace smarana (carca) nantaracya lokammadhye baki thevale
Nuha (ale.) Vara sarya jagata salama aso
Amhi satkarma karanaryanna asaca prakare mobadala pradana karato
Nihsansaya, to amacya imana balaganarya dasampaiki hota
Maga itara lokanna amhi budavuna takale
